mapper.select:
select di.id, di.code, di.name, di.content, di.raw_material, di.portion, di.taste, di.unit_price, di.sale_num, di.status, di.merchant_id, di.create_date, di.images, di.heat, di.protein, di.fat, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.phone, mi.images as merchantImages from dishes_info di left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = di.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND di.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dishesInfo.code},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dishesInfo.name},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dishesInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND mi.user_id = #{dishesInfo.merchantId}
order by di.create_date desc
